headline: Datadog (DDOG): Evaluating Valuation After Recent 13% Share Price Gain
summary: Datadog (DDOG) shares have recently caught the attention of investors following shifts in trading activity. The cloud monitoring company’s stock has delivered a 13% gain over the past month, sparking discussion about the underlying drivers behind the move. See our latest analysis for Datadog. Datadog’s momentum has picked up notably this past month with a 13% share price return, adding to an impressive one-year total shareholder return of 22%. While the company’s fundamentals and cloud-driven...

headline: Datadog Named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner(R) Magic Quadrant(TM) for Digital Experience Monitoring
summary: Datadog was positioned the highest in the Ability to Execute axisNew York, New York--(Newsfile Corp. - October 29, 2025) - Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ: DDOG), the monitoring and security platform for cloud applications, today announced it has been named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Digital Experience Monitoring (DEM). This is the second year in a row Datadog has been recognized as a Leader in the Gartner research. The company's positioning in the Gartner Magic Quadrant is based on..

headline: Wall Street Analysts Love Palantir, Datadog and Amazon Stocks Today
summary: Markets are still exploding higher pre-market. For one, markets are waiting for the Federal Reserve’s decision later today. “Markets are assigning a nearly 100% probability that the Federal Open Market Committee will approve a second consecutive quarter percentage point, or 25 basis point, reduction in the federal funds rate.
